Unitron:



The near ten million year old robot sidestepped as he saw another robot 
intrude, in the process avoiding Megatron's blast.  He ducked down, firing 
off five rapid optic blasts at Megatron's left knee joint, and two blasts 
from the rifle he held in his right hand at Firestrike's abdomen.

"Now I am sure you an impostor.  The real Megatron would not have called for 
his cronies, even if he were losing!  He had to much pride!"  Still in a 
crouched position and ready to spring his left hand shot out and with a 
magnetic attraction, the now deactivated energy blade's hilt flew into his 
left hand, a fist now surrounding the hilt as the pink glow of deadly energy 
extended from it for a few feet.

"I will kill all the tw--" Unitron began but stopped, seeing the third robot, 
Nightstrike come into view.  He kept his comm. open, just in case he needed 
to call for reinforcements.
